name: Believe or Not
description:
This guy, his name is Charles, won't believe in anything other than hard work.

He is a young CEO of a big company thanks to that, but there is no one to share all this or to be happy together, so maybe there should something happen.

Watch out and see if you could learn something from dying. 

_________________________________________________________________________

Short instructions:

Use W/A/S/D to move and can look around with your mouse.

Interact with the E-Button

_________________________________________________________________________

Thanks for so much help everyone and that you believe in me !
